text: Na'ankure Israeli vahe'mo'za zamefi hunenami'za ama agupofina ru anumzamofo mono hunte kuma eri fore hu'naze. Ana nehu'za Juda kini vahe'mo'zane, zamagehe'zane zamagranena ke'za antahi'za osu'naza havi anumzante mananentake'za insensia kre mana vu'naze. Ana nehu'za ke'zami omane mofavre nagara rama'a zamahe'za anampina korana eri tagi atre'naze.
